value:
If I was going to give someone candy
as a gift, would it be better if I made it
by hand?$k$pI'd love to hear your opinion.

You have a festival about love in your
world, too? Who did you share your
feelings with?$k$pOr maybe it was someone else who
shared their feelings with you...

You're saying sometimes the girl
confesses her feelings first? I... I...
You shouldn't try to rush things!

If you don't mind, could you teach me
how to bake? Something simple, like
cakes or muffins.

It's hard sometimes, telling someone
how much you appreciate all they've
done for you.

I was asked by
$Nf to bring
you a greeting.$k$pI have some sweets for you, too, if
you'd like to try them.

I feel courage welling up inside
me... Time to share my feelings!

How wonderful. Today will be
filled with lovely things!

Maybe I should wait until
tomorrow to hand out gifts...

Thank you! I hope you look
forward to my gift to you in return.

I'm Lilina, daughter of the Marquess
Ostia. Will you be giving a gift to
somebody as well?

What sort of present would be best?
And when should I give it? What
should I say when I do give it?!$k$pEek! Oh, sorry! You startled me!
Um... Would you mind forgetting my
rambling just now?$k$pThough, actually... If you have a
moment... May I ask you for some
advice?$k$pI was hoping you could share what
you know about this festival of love.$k$pYou will? Oh, thank you! Heehee,
you're so kind. OK, I'm counting on
you to teach me everything you can!
えーいっ
それっ！
きゃああっ！
やだっ…
I have a present for you.
This is for you.
For someone precious!
I'm not all sweet!
My present...
ふふふっ
My name's Lilina. I was celebrating a festival when I suddenly appeared here.
Eek! O-oh, my presents were about to tip over?
I need something really nice for my father...
The festival I was attending is all about giving presents to the people you care about.
What do I like? Hmm... I'm fond of sweets!
What kind of gift would make a guy like him happy...
I got you a little something. I hope you don't mind.
Wonderful.
Can't decide...
Take this, OK?
